title: Get started
description:
You can develop on basically any system that supports the prerequisites.
I personally develop on Windows and Linux. If you find that the development setup is not working for you, please submit a pull request. Unfortunately i don't have the time to test on every system. However, this documentation should be a pretty good starting point.
